name: The Most Dangerous Game (sharkwithlasers)
description:
(NOTE: the webgl version has some issues with audio among other things. I'd prefer if you play the windows version)...(note that webgl version is the postjam version)

Welcome to Zimimim Island!

Here, we Royal Blues like to hunt lowly Green Commonfolk for sport! See how many you can hunt down before the time runs out, and try shifting your perspective to reveal where they are hiding. This is...the Most Dangerous Game!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Fire Crossbow

Left Shift - Shift your viewpoint

Ctrl+Scroll Wheel - Adjust Mouse Sensitivity (only in postjam version)

---

(R to restart, ESC to quit).

--

Music and Audio by Evan Wardell

(hastily mixed by myself however, we'll work on that post jam)

--

This game was made for Miz Jam 1. Had a lot of fun coming up with an idea and mechanic for this jam. I think I bit off more than I could chew however, the commonfolk AI is 💩

There are a lot of features that I didn't finish that I'll added and list in a post jam version.

Post Jam Changes:

- Fixed music intro/loop bug

- Quality of life changes to game AI

- WebGL version

- 3d Music track blending

- ability to change mouse sensitivity
